summary: Add some conceal operation to haskell's syntax
name: Haskell-Conceal
description:
Use Vim 7.3 Conceal feature to display unicode operator
in Haskell without changing the underlying file.

GitHub: https://github.com/Twinside/vim-haskellConceal
install_details:
Decompress in your ~/vimfiles or ~/.vim, if you're using
pathogen (you should), put it in ~/.vim/bundle/haskellConceal
folder

versions.release_notes: Fixing conceal level to be local (thx Erlend Hamberg)
